/* create.TASK_TAG */ create table TASK_TAG( TAG_SN INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , TAG_SJ TEXT NOT NULL , TAG_CN TEXT , TAG_COLOR TEXT NOT NULL , TAG_DATE DATE NOT NULL , TAG_ALAM_AT INTEGER NOT NULL , TAG_NOTI_AT INTEGER NOT NULL , TAG_TYPE_CODE INTEGER NOT NULL , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DATE NOT NULL , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM DATE NOT NULL , DOMAIN_SN INTEGER NOT NULL , CONSTRAINT TAG_DOMAIN_FK FOREIGN KEY(DOMAIN_SN) REFERENCES TASK_DOMAIN(DOMAIN_SN) )
